UPDATE.LOG:
devel/raylib: Package right .so version (3.5.0)
It turned out that the version raylib 3.7.0 produces .so version 3.5.0 (as submitted in original PR)
This will be discussed with upstream, but for now, fix the build by using the version(s) produced by the build.
